aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.text: 🐣 I'm Larionova Ekaterina, a Middle Frontend Developer currently based in St.Petersburg, Russia. 👩🏼‍💻 For the last 4 years I`ve been actively immersed in web development. 📚 I have a Specialist Degree in Cyber security. ✨ I specialize in building good-looking and reliable front-end for different services and applications. I carry out implementation from layout (Figma) to release into production. I worked on projects both in a team of frontend developers and alone. 🪐 I'm continuously expanding my skill set by exploring modern frameworks and learning new technologies. 📊 You can find more detailed information about my experience in my CV.

gazprom.title: Gazprom Academic Olympiad for school students
gazprom.description:
✅ I independently developed the design of the entire system (Participant’s personal account and landing page)

✅ Coordination with the customer of all details of business logic

✅ Developed a new frontend architecture

 ✅ Rewrote the frontend from the legacy framework Backbone.js to Vue.js

domains.title: Domains page and Domain names generator
domains.description:
✅ Page layout

✅ Development of an intelligent assistant that suggests original free domain names

✅ The logic for formatting user-entered text is fully implemented on the front end using OOP principles

✅ The domain generator is implemented modularly and can be used in other projects

 ✅ Currently one of the most popular features among clients
